sentences.sContent: Did you meet any interesting people?
sentences.sCn: 你见过什么有意思的人吗？

sentences.sContent: It’s interesting that no one remembers seeing the car.
sentences.sCn: 竟然没人记得见过这辆车，真是有趣。

words.tran: 感兴趣的；有权益的；有成见的
兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行
使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与

trans.tranCn: 有趣的；引起兴趣的，令人关注的
trans.tranOther: if something is interesting, you give it your attention because it seems unusual or exciting or provides information that you did not know about
